title: Effect of the dangerous world on American politics

content.question: Since 1992, how has concern over the increasingly dangerous world described in the passage most affected American political debates?

choices.label: It has led to a decline in the power of states to enforce their own state laws.
Congress has increased its role in foreign policy, especially when it comes to combat operations.
There has been a decline in support for the free enterprise system due to the increased number of trade agreements.
The federal government has increased its surveillance powers, leading to a debate about the balance between civil liberties and security.

content.answer: The federal government has increased its surveillance powers, leading to a debate about the balance between civil liberties and security.
